attributes.action: Name all convicted paedophiles currently living in the UK or who are UK citizens living abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am not surprized that you have rejected my last petition, due to the old saying, the truth hurts.There was nothing libelous or defamatory about my statement, i am a law student and am aware of the rules. I am well aware of the number high profile sex offenders in this country, and i now call upon this government to stop abusing their position of trust with the people and start protecting the most innocent of all, our children.If you wont then i will.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
